51240.affected_area: Coquitlam (Burke Mountain , Oxford Heights, Meadowbrook, & Birchland Manor)
live_updates: We await restoration of hydro power in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51240.summary: Some customers in the Burke Mountain , Oxford Heights, Meadowbrook, & Birchland Manor areas of Coquitlam are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51240.title: July 4 - Coquitlam (Burke Mountain , Oxford Heights, Meadowbrook, & Birchland Manor) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
